com.glarimy.directory.api

Interface EmployeeDirectory


  • public interface EmployeeDirectory
    Provides interface for the employee directory services
    Author:
    glarimy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Employee employee)
      Adds a new employee
      Employee find(int id)
      Returns an employee with the supplied id
      java.util.List<Employee> search()
      Returns a list with zero to any number of employees found in the system

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(Employee employee)
  throws InvalidEmployeeException,
         DuplicateEmployeeException,
         EmployeeDirectoryException
        Adds a new employee
        Parameters:
        employee - a valid employee
        Throws:
        InvalidEmployeeException - if employee id is not positive number or if employee name is empty or employee phone number is invalid
        DuplicateEmployeeException - if a employee with same id exists in the system
        EmployeeDirectoryException - for any internal errors

      • find

        Employee find(int id)
       throws EmployeeNotFoundException,
              EmployeeDirectoryException
        Returns an employee with the supplied id
        Parameters:
        id - a valid employee id
        Returns:
        Employee with the specified id
        Throws:
        EmployeeNotFoundException - if no employee found in the system with the supplied id
        EmployeeDirectoryException - for any internal errors

      • search

        java.util.List<Employee> search()
                         throws EmployeeDirectoryException
        Returns a list with zero to any number of employees found in the system
        Returns:
        An employee list (size may be zero as well)
        Throws:
        EmployeeDirectoryException - for any internal erros
